q: and its president of technology. The shake-up, which will take effect on April 4, is the biggest change in management at the company since Mr Eric Schmidt joined as chief executive in 2001. Larry, Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making- and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured, Mr Eric Schmidt wrote in a blog post. He added that Mr Page would "merge Google's technology and business vision", while he would stay on to focus on external issues, like "deals

On Britain's Got Talent in 2009, Simon Cowell described their routine as one of the best things I have ever seen in my life. After their success in the TV talent show, Flawless have gone on to star in the movie StreetDance 3D, as well as appearing in music videos for Madonna, Beyonce, Leona Lewis and Westlife.
